title: We are a small friendly boutique community!
posting_body: Text 277445 to my cell for more info!
We're a small, friendly boutique apartment community that specializes in making our residents feel right at home.
From our savvy and personalized on-site management team to our unique social events and amazing central location, We let you "Live at Your Leisure".
Our floor plans offer modern layouts that utilize every square foot to maximize living space.
Double insulated windows keep the noise out, yet allow abundant natural light in.
Roll-away blackout shades in bedrooms and living spaces allow for ultimate privacy.
Wal-in closets include custom built-in shelving for ample storage.
Modern fixtures and furnishes give each bathroom a luxurious spa-like feel.
Select apartments have private patios, private balconies, downtown skyline or courtyard views.
Contemporary styling gives each home a clean, upscale look and feel.
